title: Irish Potato Cake
ingredients: ['150g (5oz) butter', '400g (14oz) caster sugar', '2 eggs', '175ml (6 fl oz) milk', '250g (9oz) plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground cloves', '2 teaspoons ground nutmeg', '425g (15oz) mashed cooked potatoes', '125g (4 1/4 oz) chopped walnuts', '150g (5oz) sultanas']
